P

parentMap - Variable in class Map.Map
Object of map is created name given as parentMap.
PhaseView - Class in Views
This class will implement from observer and it displays player's name and different functionality of the phase's.
PhaseView() - Constructor for class Views.PhaseView
 
placeArmies() - Method in class Player.Player
This method defines Initial placement of the armies and also prints the player and the name of the country where they want to place a army.
placeArmiesAutomatically() - Method in class Player.Player
This method defines in a helper method to place number of armies for each player automatically instead of going in a round robin fashion.
placeReinforcements(int) - Method in class Player.Player
This method defines Place Reinforcements in territories which also print's out player name,armies left in it.
Player - package Player
 
Player - Class in Player
This class is used to create players, and has all the functionality related to a player like reinforcement, attacking and fortification.
Player(String) - Constructor for class Player.Player
This method is the constructor of the Player class.
Player.GamePhase - Enum in Player
The game Phase that can be used by a player in the game
Player_Test - Class in Player
This is the JUnit Test cases for Map class.
Player_Test() - Constructor for class Player.Player_Test
 
playerCountView() - Method in class Views.MainView
this method will display total number of player's and also size of the territories
players - Static variable in class Driver.Main
list of players in the game.
populateUserEnteredContinentLines(List<String>) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method is used for populating the data of userEnteredContinentLines array list.
populateUserEnteredTerritoryLines(List<String>) - Static method in class Driver.Main
This method is used for populating the data of userEnteredTerritoryLines array list.
